string.text: I have the details of the weapon, can you do something about it?
0.45 ACP
Colt 1911
So... Hell, the spring is loose.
It's to replace, hold on.
I had one.
I don't have another one.
I don't have another one.
Hmm... here's another one.
This one should fit.
Hell, the handle of the curve, as I didn't immediately see, is so much work to tail!
Old-style hammer, you don't use this here.
Hmm, what's up... God created people, and Colonel Colonel Colt made them equal. If you know what I mean...
So, with the caliber determined, from 0.45 ACP I can build...
Not a question, we'll wrap it all up, blue tape. What caliber are you interested in?
Shall we get to work? It won't be easy.
Well, let's try it.
Not yet, I'm not sure.
You're a weird one, okay. It's up to you.
So the tools are ready, let's start?
Yeah, come on.
No, I'm not ready yet.
Come as you are.
I'm ready, where are the materials?
Here you go, here you go.
I need to think about it.
Ugh, you go... you're a madman.
12x70 "Buck"
Mossberg 590
MP133
Don't even think that with such a stock I will put together a working version.
Sorry, I was hoping you could try this.
Well... I don't have another one.
No other thing.
Well, the hell with it, I don't have another one.
Oh, here's another one.
There you go, try this one.
And how do you think this trigger should work?
No, with a gun like that, it's better not to try to shoot. You will tear up your hands.
Well, now you only have one obligation. Shoot. Don't even aim.
Don't pay attention to the stock, it's from Mossberg 590. I'm sorry, I didn't have another one. Must work well.
I need another stock, this one is quite old.
There you go, here you go.
I don't have another one.
Well, that's great! I don't have any other.
Well, I don't have any others.
You've got another one, are you sure you've got the hands where you need to grow from?
How about these two?
Hell, the second trigger broke, never liked to do this.
One of the barrels is normal, and the other dented...
Obrez, I came to the zone with this. Easy and convenient.
Hold your gun, it's so easy to collect them, I learned from them.
Solid choice for hunting. By the way, come to me later, there is one thing planned, if you appreciate guns of this type, I think you will be interested.
A TOZ34 sawn-off is less accurate, but it will hit you at point-blank range and will not appear much, be careful.
So, with the caliber determined, from 12x70 mm I can assemble...
TOZ66 Sawnoff
TOZ66
TOZ34
TOZ34 Sawnoff
So what? Are you ready?
Yes.
No, not yet.
Well, what was the distraction then?
What do we do?
Yes, go ahead.
No more.
Well, as you wish.
I changed my mind.
Uhhhh, hands itchy, where are the details?
Here, here's all you need.
I changed my mind.
Holly shit, that's a bummer.
Ready?
Yes, let's get started.
No, not ready yet.
Okay, I'm not in a hurry. Approach as you wish.
I've got everything on my hands, so?
Yes.
No.
Well, as you know.
Well, I'm ready to work where the materials are ?
There you go.
Forget it, I changed my mind.
Are you Dabil? You used to have to think.
AK74
AK74M
AK74U
RPK74
AK74
The barrel is deformed, so look, you can't work with it.
Here, this one seems normal.
I don't have another one, let's do it later.
That's all I had.
I don't have a replacement part.
I don't have another one.
I don't have it anymore.
No, that's all I have.
It looks good.
This one should fit just right here.
There you go.
Try this one, it should work.
And this one?
The stock cracked all over, so it won't work.
The spring's rigidity is not suitable, it won't work as it should.
This handle is broken, and how did you not notice? It falls apart.
So... Now here... Shit, no, the bolt doesn't fit.
It's a gun trigger, but if you want it badly... I'll use blue tape...
Well, now you have the most popular weapon in the zone, simple and reliable. Use it. The spring is bent, but quite bearable.

Done, the Stock of course is not polymeric and folding as in the original, and the muzzle brake is not improved as on the yoke, and over the receiver, no matter how hard I tried, it does not stand close to the custom-made sample, although I chose the best of what I had, appreciate it, the AK74M own person!
Your "Lady" is ready, don't get mad at her when she overheats. She'll try to please you, okay?
There you are, you're a real machine gunner! Are thos bullets enough?
AK-74, I hope it doesn't explode...
So, with the caliber determined, from 5.45x39 mm I can assemble...
5.56x45mm NATO
LR300
M4
M4A1
SIG550
SIG552
The stock is fucked up, and some asshole's been trying to clean it up.
But this one seems normal, try it.
I don't have another one right now.
That's all I had.
Blast, not anymore.
I don't have any more.
Not anymore.
All of it, no more.
There you go, everything seems to be fine.
This one must be the right one.
It's better.
There you go, try this one.
At the same time, you're a mess.
The stock is cracked, even epoxy glue will not help.
The spring is rusty and falls off, it won't even put the bolt in place.
Don't you see? There is no left cheek on the handle, how will you hold it? Woe you onion.
So it looks like it's ready. Now let's check...no... the bolt is wedged, we need another one.
Oops... I fucked up the trigger, got a replacement?
Light, accurate, quick-fire, but kernel louse, as capricious as my ex-wife. According to the law of meanness jammed at the most inopportune moment...
M4 carbine, as requested, but before you go, don't even dare to think of hitting anyone with the stock. It's got the whole recoil system in it, the result of the Zone, I think you understand.
She's here, guy, now you're ready. Take her and remember... They're on trees Johnny's...
You know, but this war will end someday. Take it and go, I need to be alone.

Ready, your SIG. In our company it was called "Swiss Kalashnikov" because of the similarity of powder gases, the bolt stroke and reliability. Rumor has it that the legendary Shooter's favorite weapon is the gun.
Swiss shorty, reliable, and compact, be careful with the barrel, for want of the best gathered with a small chip on the barrel.
So, with the caliber determined, from 5.56x45 mm I can assemble...
Well, I've already got the soldering iron and duct tape... so where are the parts?
There you go.
Something's missing, I'll come back later.
Eh, and I'm just starting to warm up the rosin.
I'm ready, where's your material?
There you go.
I've changed my mind, let's do it next time.
Okay.
PPSh41
TT33
The spring is bent, it won't work.
Hold the other one.
That's all it was.
I don't have another one.
Eh, I don't have another one.
Oh, this one's gonna be better.
How do you like this one?
The handle is gone, it's rusty from the inside. I don't have anything to clean it up, and it's not worth it.
...let's put the trigger down...What the hell... The trigger doesn't get on the battle platoon.
So that's it, the PPSh, is a heavy but reliable machine...
Hmm... It's this way... I'll glue it here... Yeah, it's done! The TT 33 is the weapon of the real commissar of the Soviet army. Now in your hands. Not a step backwards is a camaraderie! Heh!
So, with the caliber determined, from 7.62x25 mm I can assemble...

I don't have another one.

I don't have another one.
This was the last one, bravo!
I don't have another one.
No more...
There you go, try this one.
How about this one?
You're the one who's different, are your hands growing out of the right place?
See, look at this.
This is another one.
Ugh, they tried to saw it off, but they dumped it. There's no stock anymore. There are other options?
Don't you see? It's a pistol spring, and it's rusty too, it won't fit in here.
Mm-hmm. Um... Hell, there's no more handle.
So, no, no, I'm not even gonna try, this stock is shit.
I don't think this trigger is gonna be okay. Um... Yes, it is, it does not return to its original position after pressing.
AKM... in one word - classic!
AKMS - not as bad as I thought. It sawed off the stock, and put a metal one. Sometimes it will be jammed when folding, just put a little more effort into it.
Extended magazine, long barrel - was AKM, became RPK! Here you go.
Magnificent army weapon tested in battle, only morally outdated. If the arms are growing out of the shoulders, the carbine is the right one.
Chinese chimera Kalashnikov and SKS, these narrow-eyeds will make anything...
So, with the caliber determined, from 7.62x39 mm I can assemble...
7.62x51mm NATO
G3
The gun cracked, don't you see? What a crack! Nothing can be made out of it.
It's different for you.
All of it, no more.
Well, that's all there is to it.
Better not find it.
That's all it was.
No, that's all I had.
Not anymore.
Try this one.
There you go.
Here you go, here you go. It looks like plastic's okay here.
Oh, here's another one.
Hold it.
Shit, the stock's neck broke. Now let's see, no, the glue here will not help the crack is not a big enough crack. With this stock I will not collect anything...
What is this spring? It's all rusty, and bent like a, God knows what...
The handle has plastic cracked. It is about to fall apart...
Where'd you get that bolt? It's almost all rusty, let's do something working.
Hmm... Oh, shit. The trigger is tightly pulled down from the combat platoon, it's not the point, I think I know what the point is, but I need another one.
This is the German beauty! I rarely collect such samples, I'm proud of myself.
So, with the caliber determined, from 7.62x51 mm I can assemble...
Mosin Nagant
SVD
SVT40
Some fucking... Look, there's a puncture on the chamber, there's no need to put the bullet into the chamber, the barrel will have to be thrown away, and that's it.
Oh, here, try this.
That's the last thing I had.
No, not anymore.
That's all it was.
All, that was the last one.
Well, great, that was the last one.
Try, here.
This is another one.
Oh, here's another one.
You know, try this one, it looks better.
This shit, all cracked and holey, maybe you got something better?
The spring is too soft, too old.
So, now, this way... Come on... Shit, the stock doesn't go in.
The Trigger is shit, or it'll be double shots or delays, and that's, you know, deadly in battle.
The Mosin is ready, my grandfather killed more than one bastard with it, now it's your turn. Go for it!
Dragunov's Sniper Rifle, our army said, "Don't run from the sniper, you'll die tired." With Romka it happened...

Take the job. SVT40 is a good and not capricious machine, Lyudmila Pavlyuchenko used this rifle to destroy 309 German soldiers and officers, and you can't shoot so much with a bad rifle. Which speaks for the quality... Not only Lyudmila.
So, with the caliber determined, from 7.62x54 mm I can assemble...

Gewehr43
Mauser98k
StG44

It, use this.
I don't have another one.
Hm...then another time, I don't have a replacement.
I don't have another one, I'll be back when I find one.
No other thing.
I don't have another one.
How about this?
See, look at this one.
Take this one.
So, somewhere, here, use this.
Han's stock. The lacquer is wiped out and the wood is soaked and rotten.
You couldn't find any worse? This is a rusty piece of iron, not a spring.
The bolt's gone, we need another one.
The Trigger's been stuck, it doesn't reach the drumstick.
German analogue of CBT40, Gewehr43 use wisely.
98 was well suited to the conditions of fighting at the beginning of the Second World War, if only in the war he showed himself to be the best, and here he will be quite effective, despite his age.
Sturmgewehr 44... Often compared to AK, who says they have something in common with AK?
So, with the caliber determined, from 7.92x33 mm I can assemble...

Begin.

Whatever you find, come here.

Look at this.

Okay, I'll look for more.

Hold on, should be better.
From the two of us, you're the only technician here. Here, hold the replacement.
Where do you find that kind of junk? It's not a handle, it's a hell of a handle.
Why did you give me the broken trigger? Do you think I can do something about it?
Stechkin is ready. You can say Makarov's age, not a bad choice. Doesn't he seem a little heavy to you?
Done, good gun is a good satellite in the zone. You're not going to leave it, are you?
And here's your Pernach, use it to your advantage. Just watch carefully, the fire switch sticks.
The quietest in the zone... Do you like silence? Doesn't matter, here's your PB.
Makarov is ready. Few bullets, weak penetrating ability, why do you need it? Are you an amateur?
The Soviet PP, and what do you see in him? Although for the taste and color...
Oh, you asked me to collect... that's it, keep your arachnid.

And how are you going to use that? Handle shot.
The Trigger's all right, is it better?
Beretta... Good old. As I remember now from the big land, the weapons of all the "good" guys from the movies... Made with love.
So, here's the CZ75, you could say the original, or almost... had to insert a trigger from the macaroon. I work with what is.

Hold your Browning, and I'm sorry I have to use the fired handle. There are not always enough details, and you're not in the toy store. The grip remained normal, the former owner from "frying" recently got out.
MP5 is ready as requested, handle your weapons with care. A strong blow can throw away the shop...but it is not always.
Here you go, Wehrmacht's main weapon. So somewhere I had... A German medal... Well, how do you want it.

I don't have any more...
Yeah, I don't have any other... Then next time.
No, I don't have another one.
I don't have another one, so another time.
I don't have another one, only this one.
You're a jerk, take this, tell me it doesn't fit.
Here, this should be normal.
Hold the other one, this one's okay.
Well, this one should be better, here.
Yeah, here's the whole thing, but don't break it.
Are you laughing at me? It's not a bolt, it's a metal ingot, it was getting out of the anomaly.
The stock rotted all over, and you were going to use it?
The spring ordered you to live a long time, where did you get it from?
The hand of your... Firewood! How were you going to keep it?
And how do you think this trigger should work? It's broken! Or are you going to use it?
Fuh, it was hard, keep your VSK. The shutter wasn't very good, but it's the best I can do.
